line.romaji: ano hi egaita yume wo kari ni A to shite
line.hiragana: あの|ひ|えがいた|ゆめ|を|かり|に|A|と|して
line.kanji: あの|日|描いた|夢|を|仮|に|(A)|と|して
line.english: If we labelled that short lived dream we formed that day as 'A'
line.explained: that|day|drawing, painting or sketching, laying out an idea|dream|points to the dream painted out on that day|temporary|puts quotation marks around A|do, as in do the contents of the sentence so far

line.romaji: kono mirai wo B to suru
line.hiragana: この|みらい|を|B|と|する
line.english: Then the future will be 'B'
line.explained: this|future|marks this future|B|puts quotation marks around B|do everything mentioned in the sentence so far

line.romaji: kami-sama ga iru nara kono A to B to wo iko-ru ni shite onegai
line.hiragana: かみさま|が|いる|なら|この|A|と|B|と|を|イコール|に|して|おねがい
line.kanji: 神様|が|いる|なら|この|(A)|と|(B)|と|を|イコール|に|して|お願い
line.english: If there's a god out there, please let 'A' and 'B' become the same

line.hiragana: たして|ひいた
line.english: Combine them, draw a line between them

line.hiragana: かけた|われた
line.english: Then chip at them, break them

line.hiragana: なんども|たしかめた|こたえ|だ
line.kanji: 何度も|確かめた|答え|だ
line.english: That's the conclusion I came to every time
line.explained: over and over|make sure/check|solution/answer|is (a short form of desu)

line.romaji: machigai nante iwasenai kimi ga boku wo mitsuketekureta koto
line.hiragana: まちがい|なんて|いわせない|きみ|が|ぼく|を|みつけてくれた|こと
line.kanji: 「まちがい」|なんて|言わせない|きみ|が|ぼく|を|見つけてくれた|こと
line.english: Don't say that 'it's a mistake' that you managed to find me

line.hiragana: うまれかわって|も|わかる|よう
line.kanji: 生まれかわって|も|わかる|よう
line.english: Even if we're reborn, and can still understand

line.hiragana: ぼく|を|おもい|だせる|ように
line.kanji: ぼく|を|思い|出せる|ように
line.english: Make me remember once more

line.hiragana: いやに|なる|ほど|みつめて|ね
line.kanji: いやに|なる|ほど|見つめて|ね
line.english: Watch as we reach our limit

line.hiragana: わすれないで|ね
line.english: Just don't forget us

line.hiragana: ずっと|ずっと
line.english: Always, always

line.romaji: kimi to boku no kyori wo C to D to shite
line.hiragana: きみ|と|ぼく|の|きょり|を|C|と|D|と|して
line.kanji: きみ|と|ぼく|の|距離|を|(C)|と|(D)|と|して
line.english: Let the distance between you and I be 'C' and 'D'

line.hiragana: イコール|じゃ|へいこうせん
line.english: Like equal, parallel lines

line.romaji: imademo odoreru sa ano eito biito wo
line.hiragana: いまでも|おどれる|さ|あの|えいと|ビート|を
line.kanji: 今でも|踊れる|さ|あの|エイト|ビート|を
line.english: Even now you can still dance along to that eight beat song

line.hiragana: ぼくら|を|また|ちかづけて
line.kanji: ぼくら|を|また|近づけて
line.english: that'll bring us closer together

line.hiragana: かいて|けして
line.english: Write it down, erase it

line.hiragana: しん|も|おれて
line.english: break the pencil lead

line.hiragana: まだ|こたえ|が|でなくて
line.english: Still, I can't give an answer

line.hiragana: やぶれ|そう|な|とうあんゆし|に
line.kanji: 破れ|そう|な|答案用紙|に
line.english: Tear up the answer sheet

line.hiragana: それでも|しょうめいする|から
line.kanji: それでも|証明する|から
line.english: Even so, I'll still solve it

line.hiragana: きみ|と|みた|ゆめ|を
line.english: The dream I saw with you

line.hiragana: うまれかわって|も|わかる|よう
line.kanji: 生まれかわって|も|わかる|よう
line.english: Even if we're reborn, and can still understand

line.hiragana: ぼく|を|おもい|だせる|ように
line.kanji: ぼく|を|思い|出せる|ように
line.english: Make me remember once more

line.romaji: iya ni naru hodo mitsumete ne
line.hiragana: いや|に|なる|ほど|みつめて|ね
line.kanji: いや|に|なる|ほど|見つめて|ね
line.english: Watch as we reach our limit

line.hiragana: わすれないで|ね
line.english: Just don't forget us

line.romaji: odoru kimi no sugata no subete wo
line.hiragana: おどる|きみ|の|すがた|の|すべて|を
line.kanji: 踊る|きみ|の|姿|の|すべて|を
line.english: The entirety of the your dancing figure

line.hiragana: わらう|かお|も|くちぐせ|も
line.english: is laughing, sending the same message as always

line.hiragana: おぼえて|うまれ|かわる|から
line.kanji: 覚えて|生まれ|かわる|から
line.english: From the moment I remember being reborn

line.hiragana: らいせ|も|よろしく
line.english: to our next life, let's get along

line.hiragana: ずっと|ずっと
line.english: Always, always

line.hiragana: ねえ|なまえ|なん|だっけ
line.english: Hey, what was your name again?

line.hiragana: どこ|で|あったっけ
line.english: Where did we meet again?

line.hiragana: いつ|の|こと|だっけ
line.english: When was it again?

line.hiragana: なに|を|して|たっけ
line.english: What were we doing again?

line.hiragana: どんな|かお|だっけ
line.english: What was your face like again?

line.hiragana: どんな|こえ|だっけ
line.english: What was your voice like again?

line.hiragana: どんな|ひと|だっけ
line.english: What kind of person where you again?

line.hiragana: どこ|が|すき|だっけ
line.english: Where was your favourite place again?

line.hiragana: わすれない|ように|わすれない|ように
line.kanji: 忘れない|ように|忘れない|ように
line.english: I don't want to forget, I don't want to forget

line.hiragana: あした|も|あおう|ね
line.english: Let's meet again tomorrow

line.hiragana: やくそく|しよう|ね
line.english: Let's make it a promise

line.hiragana: うまれかわって|も|うまれかわって|も
line.kanji: 生まれかわって|も|生まれかわって|も
line.english: Even if we're reborn, even if we're reborn

line.hiragana: かわらないでいて
line.english: I don't want to change

line.hiragana: みつけて|あげる|ね
line.english: I'll always find you again
